Used to Show or Hide Name1 in Customer Display Name throughout MCA.ConfigValue1 as "1" will display the name1 for pages mentioned in Configvalue2.ConfigValue1 as "0" will hide the name1 for pages mentioned in Configvalue2

Used to Show or Hide Name2 in Customer Display Name throughout MCA.ConfigValue1 as "1" will display the name2 for pages mentioned in Configvalue2.ConfigValue1 as "0" will hide the name2 for pages mentioned in Configvalue2

Used to Show or Hide name3 in Customer Display Name throughout MCA.ConfigValue1 as "1" will display the name3 for pages mentioned in Configvalue2.ConfigValue1 as "0" will hide the name3 for pages mentioned in Configvalue2

Used to configure name1 Abbreviation in Customer Display Name throughout MCA. ConfigValue1 as "1" will show the intial of name1 for pages mentioned in Configvalue2.ConfigValue1 as "0" will show the full name1 for pages mentioned in Configvalue2

Used to configure name2 Abbreviation in Customer Display Name throughout MCA.ConfigValue1 as "1" will show the intial of name2 for pages mentioned in Configvalue2.ConfigValue1 as "0" will show the full name2 for pages mentioned in Configvalue2

Used to configure name3 Abbreviation in Customer Display Name throughout MCA.ConfigValue1 as "1" will show the intial of name3 for pages mentioned in Configvalue2.ConfigValue1 as "0" will show the full name3 for pages mentioned in Configvalue2

Used to configure name1 casing in Customer Display Name throughout MCA.Config value 1 as "Home|C" depicts that for home page, name1 will be displayed in camel case. C stands for Camelcase, U for Uppercase and L for Lowercase

Used to configure name2 casing in Customer Display Name throughout MCA.Config value 1 as "Home|C" depicts that for home page, name2 will be displayed in camel case. C stands for Camelcase, U for Uppercase and L for Lowercase

Used to configure name3 casing in Customer Display Name throughout MCA.Config value 1 as "Home|C" depicts that for home page, name3 will be displayed in camel case. C stands for Camelcase, U for Uppercase and L for Lowercase
Whether captcha shows up on the security page: 1 for YES and 0 for NO
Whether captcha shows up after a certain number of invalid login attempts: 1 for YES and 0 for NO
The number of invalid attempts after which the captcha shows up
site key
secret key
Optional Proxy Server in case needed
Whitelisted customer IDs who will not be shown the captcha
Used to enable/disable membership field for avios
Field to Hide Vouchers on Home page if 2LA disabled
Field to enable disable left navigation on Security page
Enable Security page after Activation: 1 to go to Show Home Security page and 0 to go to Home page directly
Configuration for preferences optin and optouts
Show and hide privacy policy section for preference 0 means hide, 1 means show
Sets the https protocol that needs to be used in the return url parameter
This key is used to enable/disable Christmas Saver call. Make it 1 to enable and 0 to disable
This key is used to enable/disable Optimizely script.
This key is used to hold Optimizely script url.
This key is used to Show reskin advising message on top of web page - CCMCA-5515
This key is used to hold the prefix of Avios membershipd for validation
Show and hide CustomerDetailsBanner 0 means hide, 1 means show
Show and hide my Message box section on home page 0 means hide, 1 means show
This key is used to find user experience in App dynamic.
This key is used to hold Country specific DTM property ID
This key is used to hold the number of days before displaying message for conversion
This key is used to show/hide Redemption Remaining text and count on Coupon Image. Keep config value1 as TRUE to show, FALSE to hide
Show and hide voucher strip on home page 0 means hide, 1 means show

This key is used to configure the virtual lockout in MCA.Configuraiton Value 1 indicates if virtual lockout is On/Off.1 indicates ON and 0 indicates Virtual Lockout is OFF and NGCLockout is ON. ConfigurationValue2 indicates the threshold for Virtuallockout.This value indicates the failed attmept number which will permanently lock the account
switch for US CCMCA-6356 (Voucher calculation change for Xmas Saver customer on home page), 1 means switch on, 0 means switch off
Switch for UK to enable prev activation
Prev clubcard range
Show and hide masking in postcode for one account banner 0 means full, 1 means masked
This key is used to configure the DateFormatInTime and it will shows used coupons date in 24hrs format
All identity end points
Used call the identity api
specify the minimum range(inclusive boundry values) of points to get converted into vouchers/miles
specify the points required for one unit voucher
specify the voucher format for string conversion
specify the step points for point target module
specify the cache duration in seconds
Used at Home page /Points Page to toggle point target strip
